channel.title: projects on Reece's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in projects on Reece's Blog

item.title: Maikutlo TV series Tracking web site
item.description: User manual – Maikutlo Introduction This user manual contains all the essential information that a user needs to fully utilise this information system. It includes descriptions of all functions, alternate use modes, procedures and processes to be followed in order to use and access all system functionalities. Step by step visual aids are also utilised for clarity. Getting started Maikutlo is a web-based series tracker. All you need is a device with a web browser that has a stable internet connection.

item.title: Maximium Intensity Flutter workout app
item.description: Project lead for a fitness mobile application for both trainers and clients Description: A cross-platform mobile application using Flutter and Dart. Tooling: Vim, Flutter, Dart, Firestore, Provider, Trello, Teams, Figma, Inkscape, LucidCharts, Draw.io, PlantUML, Markdown, Shell Methodology: Agile Design Pattern: Provider, MVC Version control and Deployment: Git and Github Vim was used as my primary IDE with the dart lsp. Learned a bit of dart, learned about widgets and the biggest obstacle was state management.

item.title: PHP Stock Photography Ecommerce site
item.description: Created a php stock photography site with paypal integration Description: A Web site with the ability for client to add, rearrange and sell photos. As well as displaying thumbnails on the site to prevent theft. Tooling: Vim, PHP, HTML, CSS, Javascript, MYSQL, ImageMagick, Bootstrap, PayPal, Trello, Figma, PlantUML, Markdown, Shell Methodology: Agile Design Pattern: Procedural PHP with templating Version control and Deployment: Git, XAMPP, phpMyAdmin
